name: Tune Frog
description:
(made for the A Game By It's Cover game jam)

Tune Frog has lost his music! Use the controller microphone to help Tune Frog find their missing tapes.

AND HIT COOL NOTES!!!                                                       

Famicase by Liam Higgins :D                                                         https://twitter.com/Jellyphresh 

how to play

  • arrow keys -move cursor in menus
  • space - select
  • backspace - back
  • 1 - enable/disable autoplay

if you're not convinced:

frog cube
